master

Class ScanThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • master.ScanThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ScanThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    ScanThred runs the US Poller and sets Alert boolean the Navigation to true when it senses an object at a certain range. Extends thread to run simultaneously with other operations.
    Since:
    2016-11-29
    Author:
    Jerome Marfleet, Yu-Yueh Liu
